alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:11PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cortland and northeastern Tompkins Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Groton, or 9 miles northeast of Ithaca, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Groton, Dryden, Harford, Freeville, Slaterville Springs, West Groton, Etna, West Slaterville, West Dryden and Peruville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
